def unbounded_knapsack_rec(weights, values, n, capacity):
    # Base case
    if(n == 0):
        return (capacity//weights[0]) * values[0]
    
    # Check if the weight of the nth item is less than capacity 
    # If it is, we have two choices
    # 1) Include the item 
    # 2) Don't include the item
    if(weights[n] <= capacity):
        taken = values[n] + unbounded_knapsack_rec(weights,values,n,capacity-weights[n])
        not_taken = 0 + unbounded_knapsack_rec(weights, values, n-1, capacity)
        
        # As we want to maximize the profit, we take maximum of the two options
        return max(taken, not_taken)
    
    # If weight of the nth item is greater than the capacity
    # Don't include the item
    else:
        return unbounded_knapsack_rec(weights, values, n-1, capacity)
    
def unbounded_knapsack(weights, values, n, capacity):
    return unbounded_knapsack_rec(weights, values, n-1, capacity)

def main():

    weights = [[2, 4, 6], [1, 2, 3, 5], [4], [2], [3, 6, 10, 7, 2], [3, 6, 10, 7, 2, 12, 15, 10, 13, 20]]
    values = [[5, 11, 13], [1, 5, 4, 8], [2], [3], [12, 10, 15, 17, 13], [12, 10, 15, 17, 13, 12, 30, 15, 18, 20]]
    capacity = [10, 6, 3, 3, 10, 20]
    n = [3, 4, 1, 1, 5,10]

    # You can uncomment the lines below and check how this recursive solution causes a time-out

    # weights.append([6502, 5116, 7474, 4210, 7849, 5630, 8482, 3031, 6952, 6503, 9413, 9443, 3887, 8903, 8546, 4474, 3212, 3716, 7098, 4880, 1295, 9148, 3058, 4830, 2132, 4511, 2363, 1510, 1644, 2234, 3449, 1686, 2357, 4654, 1039, 7919, 8817, 1384, 5484, 5943, 7158, 7004, 4950, 9496, 1776, 1142, 3613, 4042, 3476, 3492, 4718, 2149, 2155, 4119, 3052, 2071, 6735, 8775, 1344, 9174, 7385, 7962, 3538, 6679, 7372, 6676, 6212, 2193, 9287, 2741, 9452, 3452, 1308, 9327, 3800, 5800, 8733, 2165, 2792, 8559, 4712, 2336, 2326, 8062, 4418, 4951, 4460, 5578, 3068, 7256, 4166, 5843, 4599, 4566, 9173, 2203, 2503, 5092, 1551, 6145, 8134, 5845, 5958, 5064, 2092, 6621, 4492, 8799, 8359, 7968, 1085, 1867, 6967, 4915, 8305, 3129, 8819, 1978, 5895, 5681, 6805, 2396, 4960, 3886, 7423, 7641, 6490, 9356, 4516, 7566, 4500, 2485, 7116, 7433, 3828, 6664, 2561, 3832, 7624, 5655, 2504, 7206, 1207, 6285, 9439, 4039, 8934, 7481, 6906, 5621, 7655, 7529, 8898, 2997, 7853, 7532, 9130, 6879, 7764,
